it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.controllers

Class BooksController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.controllers.MediaItemsAbstractController
      • it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.controllers.BooksController

  • public class BooksController
extends MediaItemsAbstractController
    Controller for a generic media item. Allows to get several parameters of the media item (e.g. the model class) and to query the database to retrieve media items Controller for books

        Returns the fragment for the form of this media type
        Specified by:
        getMediaItemFormFragment in class MediaItemsAbstractController
        Parameters:
        categoryId - the ID of the media item category
        mediaItemId - null if adding new media item, the ID of the media item to edit otherwise
        isEmpty - true if the form should be empty (= no fields are displayed, only the action bar)
        Returns:
        the form fragment
